SEARCH
Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
This class represents the deck of cards. It contains the methods to initialize and shuffle the deck, to draw a card from the deck and to get the card on top of the deck.

  • Method Details

    • initAndShuffleDeck

      public static void initAndShuffleDeck()
      This method initializes the deck and shuffles it.

    • initDeck

      public static void initDeck()
      This method initializes the deck. HashMaps with the card id as key and the card itself as value are also initialized here. The latter are later used for network communication purposes. At last, this method generates the seed used to randomize the shuffle process.

    • drawCardFromResourceDeck

      protected static ResourceCard drawCardFromResourceDeck()
      This method draws a card and removes it from the resource deck.
      Returns:
      the drawn card, null if the deck is empty.
